Html:
When I type bibtype /t c:\bib\types /o c:\bib\norm I get an unhandled exception error that system.ArgumentOutOfRanngeException: startIndex can not be larger than the length of string.

The system hangs and when I say ok I get a long error message. According to what I can find, I have installed netFramework 3.5.1 I think I also have 4.5

Any clues

Looks like you are using the wrong format for your parameter string:

bibtype /t:"c:\bib\types" /o:"..."

So no space but rather a :
